TopicTitle: 1.8 Terrain. How do I get it?

Articles.Content:
Just now, The Dressian Exploder said:

So, I've got the 1.8 update fresh. I've landed on the Mun and not been able to see any difference. Anyone know how I get to the new textures?

 

One more thing: My altimeter is completely broken. It's not displaying a thing. I've had to track my altitudes from the map screen, but it gets pretty darn annoying after a bit.

Do you have any mods installed?

So, I've got the 1.8 update fresh. I've landed on the Mun and not been able to see any difference. Anyone know how I get to the new textures?

 

One more thing: My altimeter is completely broken. It's not displaying a thing. I've had to track my altitudes from the map screen, but it gets pretty darn annoying after a bit.

Yes. Lots. Here's a Screenshot of my GameData folder

I have just deleted EVE and Chatterer though.

Scale your UI back up to 100% to fix the altimeter. This has become a very well known bug and is all over the forums. Squad is aware and it will be fixed.

 

As for the terrain, you have to select the settings in the graphic tab on the main menu to turn them on. They are not on by default.

Edited October 24, 2019 by Galileo

Just now, The Dressian Exploder said:

Yes. Lots. Here's a Screenshot of my GameData folder

A lot of mods from 1.7.3 are broken, so if you have major bugs and issues, I would go through your list and see which ones are not yet updated for 1.8. I couldn't tell you off the top of my head, but I would definitely check. I have not yet run into any major bugs with 1.8 stock, so I believe your bugs may be associated with the mods.

Also, the terrain shaders slider is separate from the terrain quality slider. See below:
Everything here's been solved. Thanks once again people!
